mapper.select: select d.* from mk_user a join mk_user_role b on id = b.user_id join mk_role_resource c on c.role_id = b.role_id join mk_resource d on c.resource_id = d.id where a.id=#{userId} order by d.parent_ids desc,orders
select d.id,d.orders,d.name,d.type, d.url,d.permission,d.icon from mk_role_resource c join mk_resource d on c.resource_id = d.id where c.role_id=#{roleId} order by d.parent_ids desc,orders
SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_role_resource b ON a.`id`=b.`role_id` JOIN sys_resource c ON c.id=b.`resource_id` WHERE c.`permission` = #{_parameter}
